title: 23. CBD, Discounts, MLMs, J.Lo Skincare, Client Retention + Glymed Favs with Jewellee Williams.
description: Hi Roomies, in this episode, I'm chatting with my friend and spa-owner, Jewellee Williams!  Jewellee Williams is a Licensed Esthetician and owner of Crown Jewel Esthetics, located in Philadelphia. She specializes in corrective skin care and eyelash extensions. Jewellee currently sits as the Vice-chair of Glymed Plus's Unity Advisory Committee. Connect with Jewellee on IG: https://www.crownjewelesthetics.com/ In this episode we talk: - How to attract new clients + why you need to take care of your existing people - CBD in skincare - Discount codes are not your friend - Chemical peels - Choosing a line for your spa - How to excel as a new spa owner - MLMs + Celeb Lines - GlymedPlus favorites - Treating skin of color with chemical peels + homecare.  @crownjewel_esthetics Shop my Glymed Store My Website MY SOCIAL MEDIA: Tess' Instagram @myestytessa Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly  Tess' TikTok: @myestytessa Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Sweet by LiQWYD | https://www.instagram.com/liqwyd Unported License https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/deed.en_US --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-treatment-room/support
dc:creator: The Treatment Room
